nodes.bodyText:
Why you moved this method here, I see no usage of it from other class methods
Moving this method doesn't affect penalty score, am I wrong?
No particular reason, I just wanted to keep it close to the getLines() method, since they've got similar identifiers.

I was able to achieve 3.0 penalty by using the following order:

log(int,String,Object...)
log(int,int,String,Object...)
log(DetailAST,String,Object...)
getLines()

Could you please check it
